forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
